channel.title: Disney on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Disney on My New Hugo Site

item.title: TV’s Hidden Math
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: It’s often said about the current era of television that it’s an embarrassment of riches, one of the best eras of television of all time, in part because the floodgates have bumped up the quality quotient. Netflix creates so much stuff (some great, much average) that we’re unaware of nearly all of it! It’s weird to think about, but both cable TV and local syndication had a similar effect on television in the ’80s.
